offerings.heading: Adventures
offerings.description: Maple Ranch Adventures offers transformative team building events and school camps in our unique farmyard setting just 15 minutes from Plettenberg Bay. Our spacious Farm Field accommodates diverse activities while providing a refreshing outdoor experience without leaving the city. For schools, we deliver customized programs with comfortable lodging, full catering, and professional facilitation focused on building leadership, confidence and connection. Our experienced team prioritizes safety and creates meaningful experiences for all participants in our picturesque horse ranch environment.
